bill_title: Recognizing Georgine Chytka for her achievement of setting the South Dakota state walleye record.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing Georgine Chytka for her achievement of setting the South Dakota state walleye record. WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka caught the record walleye, that weighed sixteen pounds and two ounces, on November 16, 2002, below the Ft. Randall Dam on the Missouri River; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka, a Lake Andes resident, has demonstrated the ability to accomplish such a feat without the use of a boat and other technological advancements used by professional anglers; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka broke the standing record, held for twenty-three years, by nearly one pound; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka has made it her personal objective to out-fish her son Mike, and has done so on a regular basis; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka has now surpassed her objective by out-fishing the entire State of South Dakota: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Georgine Chytka be commended for her outstanding accomplishment of setting a new South Dakota state fishing record by catching a sixteen pound two ounce walleye on the sixteenth of November 2002.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing Georgine Chytka for her achievement of setting the South Dakota state walleye record. WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka caught the record walleye, that weighed sixteen pounds and two ounces, on November 16, 2002, below the Ft. Randall Dam on the Missouri River; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka, a Lake Andes resident, has demonstrated the ability to accomplish such a feat without the use of a boat and other technological advancements used by professional anglers; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka broke the standing record, held for twenty-three years, by nearly one pound; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka has made it her personal objective to out-fish her son Mike, and has done so on a regular basis; and WHEREAS, Georgine Chytka has now surpassed her objective by out-fishing the entire State of South Dakota: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Georgine Chytka be commended for her outstanding accomplishment of setting a new South Dakota state fishing record by catching a sixteen pound two ounce walleye on the sixteenth of November 2002.
